channel.title: React Native for Windows Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest React Native for Windows news and events.

item.title: Roadmap for vnext
item.description: This document outlines some context and prospective roadmap for React Native for Windows. This project is under active development by the Microsoft Developer Platform team in collaboration with Office, Xbox and other partners as well as the wider React Native community. This roadmap is not meant to be exhaustive or guaranteed since we are also keeping up with the evolving facebook\react-native project and the needs of the React Native community.

item.title: July 2019 Updates
item.description: Over the past couple of months and spread across several contributors from Microsoft, we have completed Milestone 2 for React Native for Windows. This blog post covers the highlights of the release.
